open.title: International latency
open.description: Please note users on the Afrihost network may experience increased latency to international sites and services.  Our engineers are investigating the cause. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel Reach Notice | Gauteng
open.description: We are investigating reports of issues connecting to DSTV, Netflix, Youtube and other services affecting client on the Vumatel Reach Network in Gauteng. We are working on identifying the cause and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.
